scripts.start:stable: npm run copy && npm run build && SERVER_ENV=stable node ./build/index.js
scripts.start:preonline: npm run copy && npm run build && SERVER_ENV=preonline node ./build/index.js
scripts.start:online: npm run copy && npm run build && SERVER_ENV=online node ./build/index.js
scripts.local: npm run copy && nodemon -e js,mjs,json,ts  --exec 'npm run launch:local' --watch ./src
scripts.dev: npm run copy && nodemon -e js,mjs,json,ts  --exec 'npm run launch:dev' --watch ./src
